指.definition: finger; to point at or to; to indicate or refer to; to depend on; to count on; (of hair) to stand on end

指事.definition: ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); Chinese character indicating an idea, such as up and down; also known as self-explanatory character

指事字.definition: ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); Chinese character indicating an idea, such as up and down; also known as self-explanatory character

指代.definition: to refer to; to be used in place of

指使.definition: to incite; to prompt (sb to do sth)

指南宮.definition: Zhinan Temple, Taoist temple in the hills of Muzha 木柵|木栅[Mu4 zha4], Taipei

指南車.definition: a mechanical compass invented by Zu Chongzhi 祖沖之|祖冲之

指名.definition: to mention by name; to designate; designated

指向.definition: to point towards; aimed at; facing; the direction indicated

指定.definition: to appoint; to assign; to indicate clearly and with certainty; designated

指導.definition: to guide; to direct; to instruct; coach; trainer

指導員.definition: instructor; coach; political instructor (in the PLA)

指導者.definition: coach; mentor; counselor; instructor; director; guide; conductor

指導課.definition: tutorial; period of tuition for one or two students

指引.definition: to guide; to show; to point (the way); directions; guidance; guidelines

指手劃腳.definition: to gesticulate while talking (idiom); to explain by waving one's hands; to criticize or give orders summarily; also written 指手畫腳|指手画脚

指手畫腳.definition: to gesticulate while talking (idiom); to explain by waving one's hands; to criticize or give orders summarily

指指點點.definition: to gesticulate; to point out; to point the finger of blame

指揮.definition: to conduct; to command; to direct; conductor (of an orchestra); CL:個|个[ge4]

指摹.definition: fingerprint; thumbprint; also written 指模[zhi3 mo2]

指數.definition: (numerical, statistical) index; (math.) exponent; index; exponential (function, growth)

指斥.definition: to denounce; to censure; to rebuke

指明.definition: to show clearly; to designate; to indicate

指望.definition: to count on; to hope for; prospect; hope

指板.definition: fingerboard (of a guitar or violin etc)

指桑罵槐.definition: lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree; fig. to scold sb indirectly; to make oblique accusations (idiom)

指標.definition: (production) target; quota; index; indicator; sign; signpost; (computing) pointer

指模.definition: fingerprint; thumbprint; also written 指摹[zhi3 mo2]

指檢.definition: (medicine) digital examination (of a patient's rectum, vagina etc)

指正.definition: to point out mistakes or weak points for correction; to comment; criticism

指法.definition: (music) fingering; (TCM) manipulation of acupuncture needles; (keyboard) typing technique; (dance) hand movements; (painting) finger method

指示.definition: to point out; to indicate; to instruct; directives; instructions; CL:個|个[ge4]

指紋.definition: fingerprint; the arches, loops and whorls on the fingers

指考.definition: Advanced Subjects Test, university entrance exam that assesses candidates’ higher level knowledge of specific subjects and their readiness to study in their selected academic discipline (Tw); abbr. for 大學入學指定科目考試|大学入学指定科目考试[Da4 xue2 Ru4 xue2 Zhi3 ding4 Ke1 mu4 Kao3 shi4]

指腹為婚.definition: to propose the future marriage of two unborn babies on condition that one turns out to be a boy, and the other, a girl (idiom)

指著和尚罵禿子.pinyin: zhi3 zhe5 he2 shang5 ma4 tu1 zi5
指著和尚罵禿子.definition: lit. to insult a bald man while pointing at a monk (idiom); fig. to insult indirectly; to criticize obliquely

指責.definition: to criticize; to find fault with; to denounce

指針.definition: pointer on a gauge; clock hand; cursor; (computing) pointer

指雞罵狗.definition: lit. to point at the chicken while scolding the dog (idiom); fig. to make indirect criticisms

指鹿作馬.definition: to take a deer and call it a horse (idiom); deliberate inversion of the truth

指鹿為馬.definition: making a deer out to be a horse (idiom); deliberate misrepresentation

指點.definition: to point out; to indicate; to give directions; to show how (to do sth); to censure; to pick at

指點江山.definition: to talk idly about important matters (idiom); to set the world to rights; to pass judgment on everything

指點迷津.definition: to show sb how to get to the right path
